name: Introduction to Creative Writing
description: An introductory course to the basics of Creative Writing, including poetry, short stories, novel writing, and more.

name: Introduction to Young Adult Writing
description: An introductory course to the basics of Young Adult Writing, including common themes, characterization, and more.

name: Young Adult Writing I
description: An intermediate course in Young Adult Writing, including plot structure, world-building, and more.

name: Young Adult Writing II
description: An advanced course in Young Adult Writing, including genre conventions, advanced characterization, and more.
